Magic
Spell Slots: W0: 4; W1: 4; W2: 3; W3: 2 Attack: W: 4 Spell DC: W: 12
Spells:
Arcane Lock (W2 Abju): Touched barrier passable only by designated until dispelled
Chill Touch (W0 Necr): R120' Ghost hand 2 HP necrotic, undead also Disadv self attack for 1 rd
Disguise Self (W1 Illu): Self appear different body size for 1 hr
Glyph Of Warding (W3 Abju): Glyph 20' radius 5d8 HP (Dex half) or spell up to level 3 on named trigger
Light (W0 Evoc): Touched object lights 20' radius for 1 hr (Dex neg)
Message (W0 Tran): R120 Whispered conversation w/target for 1 rd
Prestidigitation (W0 Tran): R10' Minor magic effects for 1 hr
Ray Of Sickness (W1 Necr): R60' Target 2d8 HP, poisoned 1 turn (Con not poisoned)
Shatter (W2 Evoc): R60' 10' radius 3d8 HP (Con half)
Thunderwave (W1 Evoc): 15' cu 2d8 HP, pushed 10' (Con half, no push)
Tongues (W3 Divi): Touched understand and speak any language for 1 hr
Unseen Servant (W1 Conj): R60' Invisible force performs simple tasks for 1 hr
Web (W2 Conj): R60' 20' cu restrain creatures for conc/1 hr (Dex neg, Str frees)
Magic Notes:
Arcane Recovery: Short rest recovers 3 spell slots 1/dy
Divination Savant: Write divination spells for half cost
Elemental Adept (Acid): Spells ignore acid resistance, treat 1s as 2s on damage die
Elemental Adept (Cold): Spells ignore cold resistance, treat 1s as 2s on damage die
Elemental Adept (Fire): Spells ignore fire resistance, treat 1s as 2s on damage die
Elemental Adept (Lightning): Spells ignore lightning resistance, treat 1s as 2s on damage die
Elemental Adept (Thunder): Spells ignore thunder resistance, treat 1s as 2s on damage die
Portent: Replace self or other roll 2/long rest
Spell Sniper: Dbl attack spell range, ignore 3/4 cover, additional attack cantrip
War Caster: Adv concentration, cast when holding shield or weapon, cast as OA
